item.title: Projects
item.description: DATA ANALYSIS Instagram Downloader Description: Instagram data mining program for archiving and data analysis Skills learned/used: Java, Design patterns, Unit testing, Maven War over time Description: Renders and animates territorial changes in Syria and Iraq during the Syrian civil war Skills learned/used: Perl, Selenium, Imagemagick AUTOMATION IOTA-node Description: CLI and TUI program that automates and manages IOTA nodes.
